mapper.select:
SELECT a.id, a.code, a.name, a.sum, a.py, a.wb, a.zdy, a.create_by, a.create_time, a.update_by, a.update_time, a.remarks, a.del_flag, a.sys_org_code, a.sys_org_parent_code FROM pd_package a
a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL}
AND ( a.name LIKE concat('%',#{name},'%') or a.py LIKE concat('%',#{name},'%') or a.wb LIKE concat('%',#{name},'%') or a.zdy LIKE concat('%',#{name},'%') )
ORDER BY a.update_time desc
